forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Some mixed winter precipitation possible. High -3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Some mixed winter precipitation possible. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the night progresses. Some mixed winter precipitation possible. Low near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
